entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except rain at times heavy over northern sections. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
